title: Norman: Chronicles of a Curiosity Seeker
description: These chronicles tell the incredible story of a mysterious character in fire-red sneakers, ice-blue jeans, a misty-gray T-shirt, and an earthy-green baseball capâ€”with a peculiar gleam in his eye and a Great Big Secret.... Discovered in the ruins of the home of one Martha Monroe after her sudden disappearance, let the individual reader judge the truth of it.
author: Jean Stites
